original_title: UFC on ESPN 2: Barboza vs Gaethje
overview: UFC on ESPN 2: Barboza vs. Gaethje was a mixed martial arts event produced by the Ultimate Fighting Championship that was held on March 30, 2019 at the Wells Fargo Center in Philadelphia, Pennsylvania. A lightweight bout between Edson Barboza and former WSOF Lightweight Champion Justin Gaethje served as the event headliner.
title: UFC on ESPN 2: Barboza vs Gaethje
